MethodId.description: The Xfuze Id for the method if identifiable & explicitly managed

MethodKey.description: The native key for the method if identifiable & explicitly managed

MethodType.description: The type of the payment method

MethodCode.description: The code of the payment method

MethodStatus.description: The status of the payment method

MethodReference.description: A reference attached to the payment method

EffectivePeriod.description: The period for which the FX rate is effective

MethodAtts.description: A collection (array) of extended payment method attributes

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
